Understate: The claim may understate the extent of mailbox removals by only mentioning Oregon, while the expert's verdict states that mailboxes were removed in other states as well.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing a complete picture of the mailbox removals, as it does not mention the reasons behind the removals or any alternative explanations.
